articles.title: NASA orbiter spots double crater left by mysterious rocket booster that crash-landed in March - Daily Mail
articles.description: Newly-released photos from NASA's Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter show a surprising 'double crater' roughly 92 feet (28 metres) wide created by the rocket on March 4.
